verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* helping \w do|strong="G3361"\w* \w exhort|strong="G3870"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w that|strong="G2316"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w vain|strong="G2756"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* saith: \w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* accepted \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* heard thee; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w helped|strong="G0997"\w* thee. \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w is|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w acceptable|strong="G2144"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w*; \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w is|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*.

\w Giving|strong="G1325"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* offence \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w any|strong="G3367"\w* \w man|strong="G3361"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w our|strong="G1722"\w* \w ministry|strong="G1248"\w* \w be|strong="G3361"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* blamed:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* let \w us|strong="G1722"\w* exhibit \w ourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* ministers \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w much|strong="G4183"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* necessities, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w distresses|strong="G4730"\w*,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* stripes, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w prisons|strong="G5438"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* seditions, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* labours, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* watchings, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w fastings|strong="G3521"\w*,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* chastity, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1108"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* longsuffering, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* sweetness, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* Ghost, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* charity unfeigned,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* armour \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w justice|strong="G1343"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w left|strong="G0710"\w*;

\w By|strong="G1223"\w* honour \w and|strong="G2532"\w* dishonour, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* evil \w report|strong="G2162"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G2162"\w* \w report|strong="G2162"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w deceivers|strong="G4108"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unknown, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* known;

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w dying|strong="G0599"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behold|strong="G2400"\w* \w we|strong="G2532"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* chastised, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* killed;

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* \w sorrowful|strong="G3076"\w*, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w always|strong="G0104"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="G5463"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* needy, \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* enriching \w many|strong="G4183"\w*; \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w possessing|strong="G2722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w*.

Our \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w open|strong="G0455"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, O ye \w Corinthians|strong="G2881"\w*, our \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* enlarged.

\w You|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* straitened \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G1722"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G1722"\w* own bowels \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* straitened.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* having \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* recompense, (\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w speak|strong="G3004"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w my|strong="G3004"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*,) \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* enlarged.

Bear \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* yoke \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w unbelievers|strong="G0571"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w participation|strong="G2842"\w* hath \w justice|strong="G1343"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* injustice? \w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* hath \w light|strong="G5457"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* concord hath \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w Belial|strong="G0955"\w*? \w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w part|strong="G3310"\w* hath \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w the|strong="G1161"\w* \w unbeliever|strong="G0571"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w agreement|strong="G4783"\w* hath \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w idols|strong="G1497"\w*? \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* saith: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w dwell|strong="G1774"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G1704"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w*, \w Go|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w among|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w separate|strong="G0873"\w*, saith \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w touch|strong="G0681"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w thing|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* receive \w you|strong="G5210"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w my|strong="G3004"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w daughters|strong="G2364"\w*, saith \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w*.
